item.title: Rusty Invades
item.description: Rusty Invades Source Code A ‘Space Invader’ clone made with rust and made for the terminal. Inspired by invaders Dependencies on Linux Audio should work out-of-the-box on macOS, Windows, and iOS. For Linux, the downstream package for actually playing sound requires the Alsa development libraries to be installed. CentOS sudo yum install -y alsa-lib-devel Debian/Ubuntu sudo apt install libasound2-dev pkg-config License Apache License (Version 2.0). TODO ⬜ UI. ✅ Score.
